title: Layered beef and mushroom suet pudding
description: Come in from the cold with this comforting steamed pudding of beef, stout and mushrooms. Look for well-marbled braising beef such as chuck steak for this recipe.
ingredients: 750g/1lb 10oz well-marbled braising steak, such as chuck and blade
300ml/10fl oz beef stock, made with 1 stock cube
25g/1oz bunch fresh parsley, tough stalks removed and leaves finely chopped
